rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap a face up card with a card from your hand.
Up to 2 times: Swap a face up card with a card from your hand.
rules2: Look at the top 4 cards from the deck, Return them in any order.

rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap a face up card with a card from your hand.
rules2: You and a player each pick one of your cards. Trade the chosen cards.
Look at the top 4 cards from the deck, Return them in any order.
You and a player each pick one of your cards. Trade the chosen cards.

rules1: Look at the top 4 cards from the deck, Return them in any order.
rules2: You and a player each pick one of your cards. Trade the chosen cards.

rules1: Rotate one or two cards that you own.
rules2: Draw a card. Discard a card.

rules1: Rotate one or two cards that you own.
rules2: Look at 2 cards. Return or Discard them.

rules1: Rotate one or two cards that you own.
rules2: Use an ability facing away from you. Its owner returns a card then draws a card.

rules1: Draw a card. Discard a card.
rules2: Look at 2 cards. Return or Discard them.

rules1: Draw a card. Discard a card.
rules2: Use an ability facing away from you. Its owner returns a card then draws a card.

rules1: Look at 2 cards. Return or Discard them.
rules2: Use an ability facing away from you. Its owner returns a card then draws a card.

rules1: Return a card from play. Play a card and use its ability. Draw a card.
Return a card from play. Play a card and use its ability. Draw a card.
rules2: Rotate one of another player's cards.

rules1: Return a card from play. Play a card and use its ability. Draw a card.
rules2: Draw 2 cards: Play one, discard the other. Return a card from play.
Rotate one of another player's cards.
Draw 2 cards: Play one, discard the other. Return a card from play.

rules1: Rotate one of another player's cards.
rules2: Draw 2 cards: Play one, discard the other. Return a card from play.
